demographic_segments.education_level: High school diploma or equivalent; some college preferred
demographic_segments.location_preferences: Urban areas with high foot traffic

demographic_segments.experience_level: 1-3 years in retail or related fields
2-4 years in customer service or retail

overall_insights: The Assistant Store Manager role at True Religion attracts a diverse range of candidates, predominantly from urban areas, with a significant representation of women. Candidates are generally looking for career growth opportunities and value brand reputation. There is also a notable interest from younger demographics aspiring to develop their management skills in a reputable retail environment.
